duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely and efficiently operate distributor and heavy equipment of various sizes used in road, site or highway construction and paving.
Embrace the Company’s safety culture, actively support all safety initiatives, and adhere to defined accountabilities implemented by the Safety Steering and Continuous Improvement teams.
Operate distributor truck in the loading and off-loading of hot oil materials.
Perform minor servicing and maintenance of equipment; refer major problems to the supervisor.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED) preferred. Class A CDL with HAZMAT and tanker endorsement and clean driving history required.
